summary.overview: This batch job processes customer data from the card demo application system by reading customer records from a VSAM customer database and generating processing reports for business monitoring and validation purposes.
business_functions: Read customer data records from the customer master database
Generate customer data processing reports and status information

READCUST.jcl.program_overview: Processes customer data from VSAM customer file for validation and reporting

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Program Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Program library containing executable modules for the card demo application

datasource_summary.name: Customer Data File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CUSTDATA.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Customer master data file containing customer information for the card demo application

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    CBCUS01C["Processes customer data from VSAM customer file for validation and reporting (CBCUS01C) "]
